title.rendered: Website Design and Website Development Services

content.rendered:
Get The Website Your Business Needs To Succeed In The Digital Age

It can be difficult for small and medium-sized businesses to maintain a visible and relevant profile. Why not modernize your business’ marketing efforts by developing a professional, fully functional website?

In today’s digital era, consumers will often Google a company as their first step in making any purchase. That’s why an outdated or non-existent web presence can severely damage a business’s chance of being that consumer’s choice.

Are you sure your website is representing your business properly?

If not, the ExcalTech team can help.

Website Design By ExcalTech

We work with website industry leaders WordPress to create and maintain our clients’ websites. With ExcalTech’s Website Design service, you can enjoy the following benefits:

  • Increased Visibility: When your website is functional, user-friendly, and memorable in appearance, it will do wonders for your marketing efforts. Instead of constantly reaching out to consumers through advertising, they will come to you because of your unforgettable web presence.
  • Reduced Marketing Costs: Whether you choose to continue other forms of advertising or not, your website will greatly supplement your marketing efforts. Our website maintenance service is provided under a single monthly flat rate which is easy to budget, leaving any additional funds to more traditional avenues for promotion, should you deem them necessary.

How Do We Design Your Website?

Our Website Design team manages the following for you:

  • Design and Development: We build your website from the ground up, inputting your specific content into a robust and mobile-friendly location for current and new clients to visit and find out more about your business.
  • SEO Best Practices: We manage the development of your site to fit the latest SEO standards, ensuring all the right metadata, tags, and other assets are included. This helps to boost your ranking on Google and find new prospects.
  • Ongoing Maintenance: We don’t expect you to settle for a set-it-and-forget-it arrangement. Well-run websites require ongoing maintenance to ensure it is secure and optimized. Our team can manage security patches and more on an ongoing basis for your business.

With a great-looking, professional website, your business can compete in today’s complex marketplace. Since your website is the first thing consumers see, it has to make a great first impression. Otherwise, you may find your traffic declining and conversions down. A company website should also reflect your values, experience, and industry knowledge.

Oftentimes, business owners try to cut corners and design their own websites. While this can be a good solution if you’re low on cash, it can also result in a poorly built site.

Develop The Foundation To Your Business’ Online Presence

Are you a current managed services client with ExcalTech? You may qualify for free hosting and discounts on new website designs — talk to our team to discover more.

Don’t cut corners on what may be your next client’s first interaction with your business. Get in touch with the ExcalTech team to find out what our Website Design services will do for you.
